titleStmt.title: The hole īdulgēce of p̲dō graūted to blessed. S. Cornelis is. vi. score yers. vi. score lēts. ii. M. ix. C. [and] xx. dais of p̲dō for euermore to ēdure.
titleStmt.author: Catholic Church. Pope (1513-1521 : Leo X)

notesStmt.note: Four settings, with four woodcuts of St. Cornelius, printed twice on folio sheet--STC.
Reproduction of original in the British Library.
